Package Server.game.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Server.game.player.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComputerPlayer, HumanPlayer
public abstract class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game. Can be extended by human or AI implementations. Manages the player's own ship map, shooting map, ship configuration, and game state.

      Returns:

    • makeShoot

      public abstract CompletableFuture<CellCoordinates> makeShoot()
      Called to initiate the player's shooting action.
      Returns:
      a future resolving to the coordinates chosen for the shot

    • placeShips

      public abstract CompletableFuture<Void> placeShips()
      Called to start ship placement logic.
      Returns:
      a future that completes when the player finishes placing ships

    • getShotInformationReturn

      public abstract void getShotInformationReturn(ShotStatus shotStatus)
      Called to inform the player of the result of a shot they made.
      Parameters:
      shotStatus - the result of the shot

    • takeShot

      public ShotStatus takeShot(CellCoordinates coordinates)
      Processes a shot made against this player at the given coordinates. Updates ship state and returns the result.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the coordinates being shot at
      Returns:
      the result of the shot

    • getShipsLeftInGame

      public int getShipsLeftInGame()
      Returns the number of ships the player still has in the game.
      Returns:
      number of remaining ships
